original: Ludvigson, Hugo Ludvig, e. o. hovrättsnotarie, disponent, Kinna, f. 20/ 5/98 i Kinna, Älvsb. 1., av fabr. Ludvig Svensson o. Goda Svensson. — Jur. kand. Prakt, i faderns firma L. Svensson, hosp. v. Preuss. höh. Fach-schule f. Textilind. i Krefeld. Res. före kriget årl. i Tyskl., Engl., Frankr. m. fl. länd. Anst. i firma Ludvig Svensson i Kinna 26, disp. o. styr :led. där sed. 28. Led. av styr. f. A-B Kinna Tennishaill, rev. i A-B Kinna Teater o. Konserthus, kassaförvalt. i Marks landst :fören. 29-39. Hobbies: hästsport, tennis. Svgifrfb dipl. 40.
translated: Ludvigson, Hugo Ludvig, acting appellate court secretary, manager, Kinna, b. 20/5/98 in Kinna, Älvsborg County, son of manufacturer Ludvig Svensson and Goda Svensson. - Law degree. Practiced in his father's firm L. Svensson, interned at the Preuss. höh. Fachschule f. Textilind. in Krefeld. Resided annually in Germany, England, France, and other countries before the war. Employed at the Ludvig Svensson firm in Kinna from 1926, became manager and board member since 1928. Member of the board of A-B Kinna Tennis Hall, auditor in A-B Kinna Theater and Concert Hall, treasurer in Marks County Association from 1929-1939. Hobbies: horse riding, tennis. Married and received a diploma in 1940.
